name: Alpine Adventure
description:
Take on the alpine slopes as a world-class biathlon athlete. The slope will gradually speed up as you do well, but will slow down if you perform poorly. See how long you can last and how fast you can go. Made using Phaser 3 (version 3.22.0).

Due to some technical difficulties, you can play the game in browser at https://benquadrinaros.github.io/Infinite-Runner/.

Gameplay and programming collaboration between Ben Rowland and Mark Medved. Art and animations by Thane Wisherop. Sound design by Ben Rowland using Bosca Ceoil.

Made for CMPM/ARTG 120: Game Design Experience at UCSC, Spring 2020.
